articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, Holmes Lybrand
articles.title: Member of 'ISIS Beatles' given eight life sentences for role in hostage-taking, killing of Americans - CNN
articles.description: El Shafee Elsheikh, a British ISIS fighter and member of the execution cell dubbed "the ISIS Beatles" because of their British accents, was sentenced to life in prison Friday for his role in the hostage-taking and deaths of four Americans and several others.

articles.title: U.S. to announce $800M weapons package for Ukraine - POLITICO
articles.description: The tranche comes just days before Ukraine’s independence day on Aug. 24, which one DoD official suggested could also bring a fresh American show of support.
